ygData.subject: Re: Re: lore items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Then maybe i have some reason to say that in game are things wich can be make better, you will not sell your account without reasons :) ... Silverion
ygData.messageBody:
At 17.09 10/09/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>
>
>
>Lim Dul wrote:
>>
>> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>>
>> >
>> >>Yes, I totally agree with you. Who's NOT going to camp for things like
>> >>JBoots? :)
>>
>> >Me. I have roughly 2-3 hours a night to play (on good days) and I am not
>> >willing to waste a weekend camping in a computer game. I am sure many
>> feel the same way.
>>
>> Yeah, I've never camped for anything myself too for about the same reasons.
>> But that's not the point...wouldn't you find things more fun if you COULD
>> legitimately get cool items *without* camping?
>
>Sure I would. But I just don't see that happening.
>
>Actually, I'm seriously considering quitting EQ and selling my account.
>It's bad enough that I only have a couple of hours a night to play, but
>half of that has to be spent half-soloing while trying to get a group in
>this overcrowded world, and the other half some monotone pulling and
>killing and then dying by someone elses train and losing twice the exp I
>spent the night getting.

Then maybe i have some reason to say that in game are things wich can be
make better, you will not sell your account without reasons :)


>Just not worth it.
>
>And anyways, I already got a $300 offer on my 26 Wizard :)
>
>
>--
>Sergey
>--
>
